sys_security_acl.description: Allow write for records in x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_assignment, for users with role x_nyk_nbse_time_ca.nbse_admin, and if the ACL script returns true, and if the ACL condition (timesheet.state=Open^EQ) evaluates to true.
sys_security_acl.name: x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_assignment

sys_update_version.name: sys_security_acl_cb574cc7dbfe00101a9df77c29961903
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition table="x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_assignment">timesheet.state=Open^EQ<item display_value="Open" endquery="false" field="timesheet.state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Open"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></condition><description>Allow write for records in x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_assignment, for users with role x_nyk_nbse_time_ca.nbse_admin, and if the ACL script returns true, and if the ACL condition (timesheet.state=Open^EQ) evaluates to true.</description><name>x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_assignment</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = false;
var tu = new NBSETimeCardUtil();
var userSysID = gs.getUserID();
if (current.timesheet.resource.user == userSysID) {
	answer = true;
} else if (tu.hasRoleExactly(userSysID, 'x_nyk_nbse_time_ca.nbse_admin')) {
	answer = true;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MANUJAG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-10 12:05:04</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>cb574cc7dbfe00101a9df77c29961903</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_assignment</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NBSE Time Card" source="x_nyk_nbse_time_ca">00e16545dbf604901a9df77c2996198a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NBSE Time Card">00e16545dbf604901a9df77c2996198a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_cb574cc7dbfe00101a9df77c29961903</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>GARGL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-21 06:17:13</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
